item.title: 德国国防科技的进步以及阻碍其发展的因素
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，克里斯蒂娜-基里亚索格洛（Christina Kyriasoglou）将回顾德国的最新发展，在德国，国防开支不再是禁忌。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Christina Kyriasoglou reviews recent developments in Germany, where spending on defense is no longer taboo.】

item.title: 特朗普解雇库克之举如何为美联储 "重大 "改革打开大门？
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注唐纳德-特朗普解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克的举动。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at Donald Trump’s move to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战下一季的三个关键问题
item.description: 美国传统夏季的结束还有几天，孩子们就要返校了。八月的夜晚热气腾腾，而秋天则可能是一个决定性的季节，以下是我的三件心事。【原文：The traditional end of the US summer is days away and the kids are returning to school. So here are three things I have on my mind as the steamy August tariff nights give way to what may end up being a defining autumn.】

item.title: 微软请求联邦调查局帮助追踪巴勒斯坦抗议活动
item.description:
上周，20 名敦促公司断绝与以色列军方关系的活动人士被捕。公司高管布拉德-史密斯（Brad Smith）说，他欢迎讨论，但不欢迎破坏。【原文：

Twenty activists urging company to sever ties with Israeli military were arrested last week. Executive Brad Smith said he welcomed discussion but not disruption.

】

item.title: AT&T 将以约 230 亿美元收购 EchoStar 频谱许可证
item.description: AT&T 公司将以约 230 亿美元的价格从 EchoStar 公司购买频谱许可证，这笔交易将扩大该电信公司在美国的网络。【原文：AT&T Inc. is to buy spectrum licenses from EchoStar Corp. for about $23 billion in a deal that will expand the telecommunications company’s US network.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚指责俄罗斯干扰造成乌克兰无人机爆炸
item.description: 塔林的官员说，一架在爱沙尼亚坠毁的武装无人机很可能是乌克兰无人机，由于俄罗斯在波罗的海地区进行电子干扰而偏离了航线。【原文：An armed drone which crashed in Estonia is likely to be a Ukrainian drone that veered off-course due to Russia’s electronic interference in the Baltic region, officials in Tallinn said.】

item.title: 众星拱月，美国短期收益率将进一步走低
item.description:
特朗普对美联储施压，经济增长放缓迹象指向两年期收益率下降。【原文：

Trump’s pressure on Fed, signs of slowing growth point to drop in 2-year yields.

】

item.title: 英国数据危机影响对政策至关重要的研究，学者发出警告
item.description: 英国经济学家机构警告说，英国官方指标危机的加深正在削弱对英国政策制定至关重要的学术研究，该机构呼吁采取 "紧急补救措施 "来解决这一问题。【原文：Academic research that is vital for UK policy making is being undermined by a deepening crisis in the country’s official indicators, the body for British economists warned, as it called for “urgent remedial action” to fix the problem.】

item.title: 什么是招致特朗普怒火的数字服务税？
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统改写全球贸易规则的努力中，针对大型科技公司收入的数字服务税再次成为热点。【原文：Digital services taxes targeting the revenue of big technology companies have returned as a flash point in President Donald Trump’s efforts to rewrite the rules of global trade.】

item.title: 经济放缓、市场波动损害回报，中国平安利润下滑
item.description: 平安保险（集团）股份有限公司上半年利润下降了 8.8%，原因是中国经济放缓期间股市波动和利率下调影响了投资回报。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.‘s profit fell 8.8% in the first half as investment returns were dented by stock market volatility and lower interest rates during China’s economic slowdown.】

item.title: Sea 超越星展集团，成为东南亚最有价值公司
item.description: 新加坡的 Sea Ltd. 在其电子商务部门 Shopee 的推动下反弹 300%，超过星展集团控股有限公司，夺回了东南亚最有价值上市公司的头衔。【原文：Singapore’s Sea Ltd. has reclaimed its title as Southeast Asia’s most valuable publicly traded company, surpassing DBS Group Holdings Ltd. after a 300% comeback rally powered by its e-commerce arm Shopee.】

item.title: 法拉奇支持特朗普式驱逐议程，力争领导英国
item.description: 奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）誓言要将数万名寻求庇护者驱逐出英国，这与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国推行的政策如出一辙，因为他正努力引导其民粹主义改革党在下届大选中掌权。【原文：Nigel Farage vowed to expel tens of thousands of asylum-seekers from the UK, tapping a policy deployed in the US by President Donald Trump as he seeks to guide his populist Reform party to power at the next general election.】

item.title: 梅西最爱的饮料在米莱结束价格控制后大受欢迎
item.description:
几十年来，耶巴马黛茶种植者受益于国家干预。但现在，在自由主义总统的领导下，许多种植者正在为生存而挣扎。【原文：

For decades, yerba mate farmers benefited from state intervention. But now under a libertarian president many growers are struggling to survive.

】

item.title: 从保护主义到自由市场：阿根廷的耶巴马黛茶受到冲击
item.description:
几十年来，耶巴马黛茶生产商一直受益于国家干预。但现在，在自由主义总统的领导下，许多生产商正在为生存而挣扎。【原文：

Durante décadas, los productores de yerba mate se beneficiaron de la intervención estatal. Pero ahora, bajo un presidente libertario, muchos productores luchan por sobrevivir.

】

item.title: 美国企业的喜悦之情与华尔街的愤怒情绪格格不入
item.description: 当投资者为经济放缓的迹象和股票市场的高估值而焦虑不安时，他们从美国公司那里得到了一点安慰。【原文：As investors fret over signs of a slowing economy and lofty stock-market valuations, they are getting a bit of reassurance from Corporate America.】

item.title: 南非最高法院驳回伦古家族的葬礼上诉
item.description: 南非最高法院驳回了赞比亚前总统埃德加-伦古（Edgar Lungu）的家人要求推翻下级法院关于他应安葬在祖国的裁决的请求。【原文：South Africa’s top court dismissed a request by the family of former Zambian President Edgar Lungu to overturn a lower court’s decision that he should be buried in his home country.】

item.title: 中国化妆品制造商珀莱雅寻求在香港上市，销售额却不尽如人意
item.description: 由于竞争日趋激烈和消费需求疲软，中国美容产品生产商珀莱雅化妆品公司（Proya Cosmetics Co.【原文：Chinese beauty products maker Proya Cosmetics Co.’s half-year revenue missed analysts’ estimates amid growing competition and weaker consumer demand.】

item.title: 油价下跌，中石油利润从创纪录水平下滑
item.description: 由于原油价格下跌和国内石油需求持平，中国石油天然气股份有限公司的利润从上半年创纪录的水平下降。【原文：PetroChina Co.’s profit fell from a record in the first half as crude prices dropped and domestic oil demand flat-lined.】

item.title: 泰国斥资 6200 万美元举办明日世界音乐节
item.description: 泰国将从明年起举办标志性的明日世界音乐节，旨在吸引高消费游客，促进其依赖旅游业的经济发展。【原文：Thailand will host the iconic Tomorrowland music festival from next year, aiming to lure high-spending travelers and bolster its tourism-reliant economy.】

item.title: 莫迪为何转向减税以抵消美国对印度的关税打击
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）正在寻求全面改革该国复杂的商品和服务税，以刺激国内支出，缓解美国关税对经济的打击。【原文：India’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi is seeking to overhaul the country’s complex goods and services tax, in an attempt to boost domestic spending and cushion the economic blow of US tariffs.】

item.title: 非洲公司 Madhvani 正与 Cerberus 商谈印度并购贷款事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乌干达企业集团 Madhvani Group 正在与 Cerberus Capital Management LP 谈判，以获得约 1.9 亿美元的私人信用贷款，为其收购陷入困境的印度玻璃瓶制造商 Hindustan National Glass & Industries Ltd 提供资金。【原文：Ugandan conglomerate Madhvani Group is in talks with Cerberus Capital Management LP for a private credit loan of about $190 million to fund its acquisition of distressed Indian glass bottle maker Hindustan National Glass & Industries Ltd, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国企业在政治风险中测试信贷买家需求
item.description: 就在法国政治风险升温之际，与国内经济关系不大的法国公司正寻求在债券市场上筹集新资金。【原文：French companies with limited exposure to the domestic economy are looking to raise new funds in the bond market just as the country’s political risk is heating up.】

item.title: 英国债券收益率接近 1998 年高点，政府压力倍增
item.description: 周二，英国债券收益率飙升至 27 年来的新高，给首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的政府带来了削减财政支出的压力。【原文：UK bond yields soared to within a whisker of a 27-year high Tuesday, piling pressure on Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s government to reduce fiscal expenditure.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 Lunate 公司入股布雷万公司，承诺出资 20 亿美元
item.description: 布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management）将向阿布扎比的 Lunate 公司转让少数股权，这是这家宏观交易公司达成的一项里程碑式的协议。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management is set to hand a minority stake to Abu Dhabi’s Lunate in a milestone agreement for the macro-trading firm that turned the emirate into its biggest risk center in just a year after setting up a local office.】

item.title: 原油油轮闲置，阿联酋禁止从苏丹运货成为焦点
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国禁止来自苏丹的货物入港，这已开始影响石油流通，至少有一艘满载原油的船只无法靠港，可能被迫在新加坡卸货。【原文：A ban by the United Arab Emirates on port access for cargoes from Sudan has started to impact oil flows, with at least one crude-laden vessel unable to call, potentially forcing it to offload in Singapore.】

item.title: <strong>亚当-波森谈后美国世界中超现实的杰克逊霍尔</strong
item.description:
一个时代的终结。【原文：

The end of an era.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：亚当-波森讲述超现实的杰克逊霍尔 2025（播客）
item.description: 一年一度的杰克逊霍尔研讨会从形式上讲是一次学术会议。经济学家和央行行长齐聚一堂，讨论货币政策领域最重要、最前沿的观点。但由于美国总统特朗普对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的无情抨击，今年的会议无疑给人一种不同的感觉。央行独立性的整个前提再次成为一个活生生的问题。如果没有中央银行的独立性，几乎所有的学术讨论【原文：The annual Jackson Hole symposium is, formally speaking, an academic conference. Economists and central bankers gather to discuss the most important, cutting edge ideas in monetary policy. But there was certainly a different feel this year because of the relentless attacks on Fed Chairman Jerome Powell coming from President Trump. The whole premise of central bank independence is becoming a live question again. And without central bank independence, almost all of the more academic discussions fe】

item.title: 瑞士制造商认为美国关税加剧了 "下滑螺旋
item.description: 由于美国出人意料地对瑞士征收 39% 的关税，瑞士的制造业陷入了衰退，而且衰退可能会更加严重。【原文：Switzerland’s manufacturing sector is mired in a recession that’s likely to get worse because of the 39% tariffs the US unexpectedly imposed on the country.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉支持的 Ignis Therapeutics 据称酝酿在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比主权财富基金穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.）支持的中国生物技术公司Ignis Therapeutics正在考虑在香港首次公开募股。【原文：Ignis Therapeutics, a Chinese biotech firm backed by Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund Mubadala Investment Co., is considering a Hong Kong initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百度酝酿再次出售点心债券，今年市场规模创历史新高
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，在中国搜索引擎市场创纪录的一年里，中国最大的搜索引擎运营商百度公司在首次发行离岸人民币债券几个月后，正在考虑再次发行点心债券。【原文：Baidu Inc., China’s top search engine operator, is considering another dim sum bond offering just months after it priced its first such offshore yuan notes, people familiar with the matter said, amid a record year for the market.】
